response.overview: After a guilt-ridden soldier takes a job in a subterranean psychiatric facility, he discovers that the hospital’s “redemption therapy” erases guilt by transferring it into living hosts — and that he’s the experiment’s original test subject. Torn between destroying the system or preserving humanity’s illusion of peace, he must face the ultimate truth: redemption and identity cannot coexist.
response.title: The Glass Citadel
